description:
Burly trail runners with features that promote a natural running gait. The ample toe box allows your toes to spread and splay naturally during your foot strike and zero drop promotes a fluid stride. An updated upper construction with a lighter overall weight lets you fly down the trail. Great for training, racing and a great option for runners with high-volume feet.

  • Seamless engineered knit upper is reinforced with overlays for added protection
  • Wide toe box accommodates natural spreading and splaying at the moment of foot strike
  • Balanced Cushioning™ Promotes better form and foot alignment while reducing impact
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
  • MaxTrac™ rubber outsole features unique directional lugs under the metatarsals that are designed to engage as you push off
name: Altra Superior 6 Trail Running Shoes - Women's
